title: TV Tropes may grant government agencies and other third parties user information during investigations

tosdr.case: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
tosdr.tldr: When the TV Tropes service is undergoing an investigation into potential fraud, they may release information on users to government agencies or investigative companies to aid in their investigation. While it is stated that this may occur when under legal obligation to do so, or when they are investigating fraud cases in connection to their site, no further information on the topic has been made present.
